1318020.name: Seals of the Unborn
1318020.description:
Becoming a monster is not a failure — it is part of the journey.

Every door you open demands a sacrifice.
Every choice leaves scars that cannot heal.
Some prices are paid in flesh.
Others, in what makes you human.

The real question is not whether you will lose your humanity,
but whether there will be anything left to return to once the world is saved.

EXPLORE A DYING WORLD

Four biomes. Four guardians. Your choice which to face first.

Navigate precision platforming and environmental puzzles as your options evolve and paths shift.

Face nine bosses.

Uncover a story of dragons, kings, and the terrible cost of keeping secrets.

PROGRESSION IS DEFINED BY LOSS

As the story unfolds, familiar options fade away, trusted paths close, and the world demands adaptation over mastery.

There is no rebuilding what was lost — only learning to move forward without it.

KEY FEATURES

  • A Tragic Fairy Tale — Uncover a story of family, betrayal, and the irreversible cost of salvation

  • Progression Defined by Loss — Adapt as familiar paths close and trusted options fade

  • Your Journey, Your Order — Face four legendary guardians in any sequence. No two playthroughs need to follow the same path

  • Platforming Meets Puzzles — Navigate precision challenges and environmental puzzles woven into a decaying world

  • Meaningful Boss Battles — Nine climactic encounters that challenge both skill and strategy

  • Stylized Visuals — Cel-shaded art brings a dying kingdom to life with haunting beauty

  • Irreversible Consequences — No respec. No rewind. Every choice leaves permanent marks

DARE YOU PAY THE PRICE?

The seals are waiting. The castle remembers.
And in the end, you'll understand why your father sent you to the woods...
1318020.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 波兰语, 土耳其语
